definition: (of land or fields) prepared for raising crops by plowing or fertilizing
details:
adjective
- (of land or fields) prepared for raising crops by plowing or fertilizing
= example: (of land or fields) prepared for raising crops by plowing or fertilizing
- marked by refinement in taste and manners
= example: marked by refinement in taste and manners
= synonyms: civilized
- no longer in the natural state
